publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3665 Brian Adam: Local Authority Housing Stock - Aberdeen-That the Parliament congratulates the local authority tenants of Aberdeen on their emphatic decision to retain local authority housing in the recent ballot; condemns the waste of resources by Aberdeen City Council in conducting this exercise, despite the previously acknowledged consensus opinion of tenants in favour of the chosen option; calls on the Scottish Executive to abandon its ill-advised policy on large-scale voluntary transfer of council housing stock, and endorses the call for Aberdeen to be given prudential borrowing powers to improve the standards and numbers of affordable council houses in Aberdeen.
